> [akito](#comment_368_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): You can make your own UEFI certificates and add them to trusted easily by using Linux. No need for external devices or VeraCrypt for that. Once this is done, the disk can be of course separately encrypted.
